segments.text: I want to meet you . Are you free this evening ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , actually , I'm not free today . Do you have anything urgent ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , I just want to meet you .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Hmm , that's all right . Shall we meet at the bar near the beach ?
segments.speaker: S1
